TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ExecutionType extends System.Enum

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

span.span: Specifies the execution mode for activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] ## Examples 다음 코드 예제에서는 열거형을 사용하여 활동의 실행 모드를 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code example shows how to set the execution mode for activities using the enumeration. 이 코드 예제는 Simplereplicatorworkflow.cs 파일에 있는 Replicator SDK 샘플의 일부입니다.This code example is part of the Replicator SDK Sample from the Simplereplicatorworkflow.cs file. 자세한 내용은 참조 [복제기를 사용 하 여](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e35f26b-cf12-4c04-9d25-9ceb958f2858)합니다.For more information, see [Using Replicator](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e35f26b-cf12-4c04-9d25-9ceb958f2858). [!code-csharp[Wf_samples#179](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets11.cs#179)] [!code-vb[Wf_samples#179](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets11.vb#179)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Activities.ExecutionType Parallel = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Workflow.Activities.ExecutionType Sequence = int32(0)

summary.span: 이전 활동의 실행이 끝난 후에 각 활동이 차례로 실행됩니다.

span.span: Each activity is executed in turn, after the previous activity has finished running.
